text: @SethAbramson IMO, the issue w/higher survivability is as ICUs fill up, they turn away new critical cases. This will result in an uptick of deaths not counted as coronavirus, but indirectly attributable to the pandemic. This destroys arguments we have nothing to worry about w/a low death rate.
